stories.title: Bezos offers to cover $2B in NASA costs in exchange for lunar lander contract

stories.text:
I really have never used adwords seriously before and this time I set up a small landing page for a k8s dev tool I wanted to see if anyone had interest in, wrote the copy myself and set up a modest daily budget on Friday, today I woke up to the account being completely suspended for circumventing systems, which seems to be the highest tier violation, and for the life of me I'm not really sure why.

The landing page is https://www.kubelord.com and I can't see anything wrong with it so I'm just generally confused.
stories.title: Ask HN: Adwords account banned for seemingly no reason what should I do?
